page.title: 06The Village School
page.content: Whitton School has 4l children who come by car and bus -only two live in the village.They come from about 7 miles away.About five other village schools have closed and the children come here. We have an indoor heated swimming pool. The school was started in l724 with money from Dame Anna Child who lived near here.Money comes, still, from l40acres that is let out every year and this helps the school- it pays for books,equipment and things like trips.It also gives grants to children going to college from around here. The county council pay the teachers and look after the inside of the school. The school is very lucky to have this money- most state schools have hardly any money.There is no other school like this one in England or Wales.
